name: Bollybun
tag_list: bollywood-movie-reviews, bollywood-gossips, bollywood-celebrity-gossip, bollywood-news, bollywood-movie-releases, bollywood-movie-trailers, bollywood-stars, bollywood-scandals, bollywood-parties
overview:
Bollybun is a growing entertainment portal and destination for people hitting the Internet looking for latest Bollywood celebrity news, Bollywood celebrity gossip and Bollywood movie news. The portal updates and provides juicy Bollywood news about the celebrities that make up the entire showbiz of the Bollywood.

Bollybun.com domain is about three years old, originally registered in 2009 and paid for through 2013 and we want to make it address for people wanting to know anything in the world of Indian cinema.
